html: Scientists are warning that Arctic sea ice is thinning and melting more than ever before. Sea ice off northern Greenland, often called “the last ice area”, is breaking up for the first time. We need #ClimateAction now - tomorrow will be too late.pic.twitter.com/tcOHdagZci

html: #BREAKING: We just won a major court victory banning the Trump EPA from allowing the extremely toxic pesticide #chlorpyrifos to be used on food. Studies have shown that kids are so harmed by exposure to chlorpyrifos that their brain structure changes and their IQ is impacted.
text:
#BREAKING: We just won a major court victory banning the Trump EPA from allowing the extremely toxic pesticide #chlorpyrifos to be used on food.

Studies have shown that kids are so harmed by exposure to chlorpyrifos that their brain structure changes and their IQ is impacted.
